page.title: 02A CHILDRENS GAME
page.content: Elastic is a popular game in the summer for girls. You get a long piece of elastic and tie the two ends together to make a circle. Two people stand in it with their legs apart to make a narrow rectangle. Meanwhile another person puts one foot inside the elastic and the other foot out side. You do this four times. Then jump in, then out. The people holding the elastic have the elastic round there ankles. If you get that right you go on to knees. Some times you say a rhyme too. This is the one we say. "England, Ireland, Scotland,Wales, Inside,outside,donkeys tails." Another name for this game is French skipping.
